summary: Lamb to the Slaughter
title: Lamb to the Slaughter
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2veSGGp

by silvereyedotaku

When Peter Parker’s parents pass away, he’s sent to live with his reclusive godfather, Tony Stark, in the middle of nowhere.

The days seem to stretch out into nothingness, but as time passes, he becomes drawn to the hushed village and forests surrounding the house, ignoring the ominous warnings from those around him.

He’ll live to regret not listening.

Words: 3060, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Steve Rogers, Other Avengers
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Tony Stark, Past Tony Stark/Pepper Potts, Peter Parker/Steve Rogers, Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - No Powers, Family Secrets, Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Grief/Mourning, Minor Character Death, Implied/Referenced Suicide, Hurt Peter Parker, Murder, Protective Tony Stark, Alternate Universe - Horror, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Rating May Change

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Chronicles of the Merchant: Book 1
title: Chronicles of the Merchant: Book 1
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ahf4Ve

by MonPetitTresor

Book 1: The Beginning

When Tony went through the wormhole, it was with the knowledge that this was a one-way trip. There’d be no coming back from it. The aliens had to be stopped, and the Avengers had to close the portal. Tony knew that, and he accepted it. When he closed his eyes for that last time in the vast darkness of space, he expected it to be the end.

He never expected to open them again, or to find himself alone - minus the suit and the arc reactor - lying in the sand in the middle of some desert. Where the hell was he?

Before he gets the chance to start to find answers, he’s found by a group of people who don’t have his best interests at heart.

Forced to be their captive, the only thing Tony do is try to survive until he finds a way to get free. No matter what it takes. Even if it means befriending a man who he finds himself hating a whole lot less than he should.

Words: 5686, Chapters: ¼, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Immortal Tony

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Highlander: The Series
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Methos (Highlander), Kronos (Highlander), Caspian (Highlander), Silas (Highlander)
  • Additional Tags: dark themes, Violence, Rape, Hurt Tony, slight stockholm syndrome, Angst and Feels, Rough Sex, Knife Play, Dom/sub, submissive Tony Stark, Dom Methos, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, BAMF Tony Stark, Tony-centric, Time Travel, Ancient History, Immortal Tony Stark, Hand-wavey Science, Magic, Four Horsemen, Triggers galore here people, cautious as you read, It Gets Worse Before It Gets Better


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ahf4Ve

summary: Haunting Past
title: Haunting Past
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2K64u3a

by WeirdWarrior

My name is Natasha Romanoff, this is my story; more specifically…this is the story of how I die. It’s also a story of love and laughter; of tears and anger; of hardships and blood. It all leads to my death, it’s just a really long road before I’m six feet under.

summary: I just told my parents that Tony and Stephen are Peter’s paents and my mum said that he has no parents and I was like “Yes, he...
body: I just told my parents that Tony and Stephen are Peter’s paents and my mum said that he has no parents and I was like “Yes, he does have parents. Tony and Stephen are his parents” and she lauged a bit and said “Oh, Okay.” I WON !!!

blog.name: builder051
blog.title: ill-o-mania
blog.description:
•I'm Laur, an adult human. He/him.

• I write stuff, draw stuff, and review films. Original and fandom content (primarily MCU; full list here).

• Fics are hurt/comfort, angst, sickfic, illness & injury, and emeto. • Drawings are largely gen with occasional i&i or nsfw. • I take commissions and prompts for fics and art.

| Check kink status here

| See characters and fandoms here

| Film Crits are here

| Buy me a coffee here

| See master story list here

| I'm on AO3 as Builder

| Professional blog is @llcupp-author

| Personal sideblog is @my-wayward-son

| Vietnam War art sideblog is @laur-draws-war

• Chat me up if you want. I’m too shy to initiate anything, but if you get my attention, I’ll respond.

summary: I feel like I saw you use Pepper as a side character at least once (sorry, wandering eyes here mean I can't check rn) How about...
question: I feel like I saw you use Pepper as a side character at least once (sorry, wandering eyes here mean I can't check rn) How about "You’re not yourself today. What’s going on?" with sick and hiding it Tony and concerned Pepper if you want, or literally anyone with Tony if you're not feeling her :D
answer:
“Hey,” Pepper calls as she descends the stairs down to the lab.  “You still working?”  

Tony’s hunched over his desk, tapping at his iPad with a stylus.  He glances up when Pepper appears in front of him.  “Oh.  Um, Yeah,” he says, absently rubbing his eyes with the back of his hand.  

“Another upgrade to your armor?” Pepper asks.

“Yeah,” Tony says again.  “I mean, no.  To the suit.  Peter’s suit.  He doesn’t have armor…”

“Ok.”  Pepper scoots a pile of papers and sits on the edge of the desk.  “You want some breakfast.”

“Yeah, that’d be good.”  Tony returns his attention to the sketch on the screen.

“Do you have any idea what I just said?” Pepper asks, reaching down to turn off the iPad.

“Hey!” Tony complains.  

“You’re not yourself today.  What’s going on?”

“I’m fine.”

“You’re pale,” Pepper says, brushing a rogue curl off Tony’s forehead.  “And you just agreed to eat without putting up a fight.”

“I did?”

“And you’re having conversations without knowing what you’re saying.”  Pepper gives him a small smile.  “You feel a little warm.”

“That’s funny, because it’s freezing in here,” Tony says.

“Come upstairs.”  Pepper hops down from the desk and grabs Tony’s hands.  “We’ll get you patched up.”

summary:
I’m-uh-Bucky (Drabble Request) 
 Request: #92- “Everyone keeps telling me you’re the bad guy.” 
For: @nanagirl19  
Pairing:...
caption:
I’m-uh-Bucky (Drabble Request)

Request: #92- “Everyone keeps telling me you’re the bad guy.”

For: @nanagirl19

Pairing: Bucky Barnes x Black!Reader

Word Count: 859

Warnings: None

Permanent Tags List: @avc212 @iamzion-therealhabesha

A/N: So I got this request after I posted my ‘Requests Wanted’ post last week and I still got it done later than I wanted. But here it is hopefully it’s good, whatever I write it never sounds good to me and I hate it, but here we go.

Requests are OPEN, if you want to be added to the tags list for a certain character, just ask. Masterlist

 First day as an Avenger. Let’s do this. You think to yourself as you stride, almost at a skip, into the tower. You are greeted by the somewhat eerie sight of Natasha, Tony, and Steve just standing there, waiting for you. Once you approach them Tony shakes your hand.

   “Y/N, right on time. Welcome to the Avengers tower. You should already know who we are-“ he begins but is interrupted by Steve.

   “Tony…” he turns to you and reaches out his hand for you to shake. “I’m Steve. That’s Natasha. And its it’s hard not to know Tony. Welcome to the tower.” he flashes a bright white, charming smile.

   “We’ll debrief you on our latest mission while we take you to your room.” Natasha shakes your hand and begins to walk out, you following, then Steve, and finally Tony.

   As they took you through the tower they explained that there has been a super soldier assassin from Hydra that has been on the run. He was previously brainwashed by the evil organization but has since gotten away and went into hiding, but because of the crimes he committed while brainwashed, S.H.I.E.L.D has to bring him into custody. His name is James “Bucky” Barnes and he was Steve’s best friend.

   “Well that’s quite a bit to take in, but I promise that with whatever you need me to do I won’t fail you guys.” You stand and face your role models, your good posture overdone.

   “I like you. You’re loyal.” Tony smile and leaves the room, Steve following after giving you another smile.

   “Be down in the conference room by 6 so we can go over some more details.” Nat grins and pats your shoulder, then leaves you in your room. You flop onto your new bed and grab the map that they printed out for you. You scan it and see that there was a suspiciously unused room in the tower, so you thought the best thing to do was to explore. You leave your room and turn toward the direction of the room and after a couple more turns you finally reach it. Before opening the door you press your ear against it, trying to listen for any alarming noises. None arise other than slight shuffling that you assume was from your hand on the door or something similar. You reach for the door knob and keep your head on a swivel as you turn the door knob, and once it’s open you quickly step into the room and quietly close the door. You take a deep breath and turn around to the only slightly startling sight of a person, a man, fresh out the shower, towel around his waist and water droplets glistening on his skin. After further examination you realize it Bucky Barnes, the guy that was supposedly dangerous and in hiding.

   “What are you doing here?” You raise an eyebrow, trying hard to keep your eyes from wandering down toward his defined V-line.

   “What are you doing here? Steve said no one comes to this room.” He responds, still frozen from being caught.

   “Well I just joined the Avengers, and I decided that i wanted to look around the tower. Every other room in the tower was labeled on the except for this one, so that’s how I ended up here. I’m Y/N, by the way.” you give a small wave but stay in your spot by the door.

   “Hey. I’m-uh-Bucky. And I’ll be right back.” He disappears into the adjacent bathroom and returns now wearing red plaid pajama pants and his hair up in a man bun.

   “Well, Bucky, Everyone keeps telling me you’re the bad guy, but that doesn’t seem like the case to-” you begin, but you’re quickly interrupted.

   “Hey Buck, here’s a shirt. Sorry it took so long, we had to meet the new recruit. She’s kinda cute, I think you would like her-“ Steve busts through the door but quickly closes his mouth, eyes growing by the second.

   “As flattering as that is, I really need you explain what’s going on before we build any relationships.” you giggle and sit down on the bed. Steve approaches and takes a seat next to you, then goes on to explain how he brought Bucky here to get him away from anyone that knows about his destructive past and the ways to conjure back up that aggressiveness.

   “Well, now that I know what’s going on, I would love to get to know you, James. And I promise to keep this little secret.” You stand from the bed and head to the door. “Welp, see you later, James.”

   “Please, call me Bucky.” Bucky responds giving you the most minuscule smile.

   “Alright then, Bucky. And Steve, I’ll see you at 6.” You stride out the room and close the door behind you, heading back to your room.

   “I like her. I hope she stays.” Bucky stands from the bed and pulls the shirt Steve brought on.

   “Me too, Buck. Me too.” Steve looks back at the closed door, the feeling of your presence still lingering in the room.

   “Hey. I’m-uh-Bucky. And I’ll be right back.” He disappears into the adjacent bathroom and returns now wearing red plaid pajama pants and his hair up in a man bun.

   “Well, Bucky, Everyone keeps telling me you’re the bad guy, but that doesn’t seem like the case to-” you begin, but you’re quickly interrupted.

   “Hey Buck, here’s a shirt. Sorry it took so long, we had to meet the new recruit. She’s kinda cute, I think you would like her-“ Steve busts through the door but quickly closes his mouth, eyes growing by the second.

   “As flattering as that is, I really need you explain what’s going on before we build any relationships.” you giggle and sit down on the bed. Steve approaches and takes a seat next to you, then goes on to explain how he brought Bucky here to get him away from anyone that knows about his destructive past and the ways to conjure back up that aggressiveness.

   “Well, now that I know what’s going on, I would love to get to know you, James. And I promise to keep this little secret.” You stand from the bed and head to the door. “Welp, see you later, James.”

   “Please, call me Bucky.” Bucky responds giving you the most minuscule smile.

   “Alright then, Bucky. And Steve, I’ll see you at 6.” You stride out the room and close the door behind you, heading back to your room.

   “I like her. I hope she stays.” Bucky stands from the bed and pulls the shirt Steve brought on.

   “Me too, Buck. Me too.” Steve looks back at the closed door, the feeling of your presence still lingering in the room.

   “Please, call me Bucky.” Bucky responds giving you the most minuscule smile.

   “Alright then, Bucky. And Steve, I’ll see you at 6.” You stride out the room and close the door behind you, heading back to your room.

   “I like her. I hope she stays.” Bucky stands from the bed and pulls the shirt Steve brought on.

   “Me too, Buck. Me too.” Steve looks back at the closed door, the feeling of your presence still lingering in the room.
